ישמח ישראל על הגדה של פסח
יסמח ישראל על הגדה של פסח

schema.title: Yismach Yisrael on Pesach Haggadah
schema.heTitle: ישמח ישראל על הגדה של פסח

enDesc: Yismach Yisrael, written by Rabbi Yerachmiel Yisrael Danziger (1853–1910), is a compilation of Divrei Torah on the Haggadah. Rabbi Danziger was the most well-known member of the Aleksander Hasidic dynasty. Yismach Yisrael is a spiritual work which views the Passover seder as a time for renewal and healing. An example of this can be found in the first comment on Ha Lachma Anya, where the “healing power of matzah” is discussed.
enShortDesc: 20th-century commentary by Polish chasidic leader Rabbi Yerachmiel Yisrael Danziger.
